field.name: mapcss
field.default: /* For img in the map remove borders, shadow, no margin and no max-width */ .map img { border: 0px; box-shadow: 0px; margin: 0px; max-width: none !important; } /* Make sure the directions are below the map */ .directions { clear: left; } /* Solve problems in chrome with the show of the direction steps in full width */ .adp-placemark { width : 100% }
field.label: GOOGLEMAPS_MAPS_CSS

field.name: googlewebsite
field.label: GOOGLEMAPS_GOOGLEWEBSITE
field.option: Dem. Rep. of the Congo - maps.google.cd
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines - maps.google.com.vc

field.name: langanim
field.default: en;The requested panorama could not be displayed|Could not generate a route for the current start and end addresses|Street View coverage is not available for this route|You have reached your destination|miles|miles|ft|kilometers|kilometer|meters|In|You will reach your destination|Stop|Drive|Press Drive to follow your route|Route|Speed|Fast|Medium|Slow
field.label: GOOGLEMAPS_MAPS_LANGANIM
